p:
Propan-2-one O-(3-(tert-butylamino)-2-hydroxypropyl) oxime oxalate
3 : oxalate salt. 1H NMR (400 MHz, DMSO-d 6): δ 4.00–3.87 (m, 3H), 2.99 (dd, J = 2.4 Hz, J = 12.4 Hz, 1H), 2.76 (dd, J = 9.1 Hz, J = 12.4 Hz, 1H), 1.81 (s, 3H), 1.26 (s, 9H). 13 C NMR (100 MHz, DMSO-d 6): δ 164.7, 155.0, 74.4, 65.5, 56.0, 44.1, 25.0, 21.2.
